about_the_game:
Behold the official map poster of the Calvard Republic, the grand stage of The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II.

This bird's-eye view captures the full scope of this economic powerhouse, showcasing its transformation since the democratic revolution a century ago. From the capital city of Edith to its provincial towns, every crucial location in the narrative is meticulously mapped, including the borders with the Erebonian Empire and Crossbell State.

Beyond serving as a companion piece for tracking characters' journeys, this poster brings to life the remarkable scale of Calvard as a nation.

content_descriptors.notes:
Rare occurrences of violence against bound hostages.
Discrimination against fictional minorities.
Usage of Fantasy Drugs.
Insinuation of child prostitution.
Depiction of Suicide
